text: "A Touch of Paradise" is a 1982 song by Australian rock band Mondo Rock for their third studio album Nuovo Mondo. The better known is the John Farnham version and was released from his 12th studio album Whispering Jack. It went to number 27 in Australia and number 47 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== # "A Touch of Paradise" - 4:45 # "Help!" (Live Version) \- 4:13 Category:1982 songs Category:Mondo Rock songs Category:John Farnham songs
title: A Touch of Paradise
